thread.title: BRIEF-Xiangxue Pharmaceutical Signs Letter Of Intent With General Electric's Shanghai Affiliate

title: BRIEF-Xiangxue Pharmaceutical Signs Letter Of Intent With General Electric's Shanghai Affiliate

organizations.name: brief-xiangxue pharmaceutical signs letter of intent with general electric
general electric's shanghai affiliate reuters staff

text:
January 17, 2018 / 10:57 AM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-Xiangxue Pharmaceutical Signs Letter Of Intent With General Electric's Shanghai Affiliate Reuters Staff 1   Xiangxue Pharmaceutical Co Ltd : 
* SAYS IT SIGNS LETTER OF INTENT WITH GENERAL ELECTRIC'S SHANGHAI AFFILIATE ON MEDICAL-RELATED COOPERATION Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2mEzBt4 Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
